title: People centric reminders/triggers
body:
This is basically an extention to GeoFencing and what I would call "Find my friends" kind of apps. With GeoFencing in place, WP will know the location of every user at any given time. I would like to have a reminder system (API) that allows me to know if the phone is near a phone from a friend (location based). Example: "Remind me to ask Holly about the project status when I meet her the next time".
Having this capability would Windows Phone give the edge of innovation in regards to being people centric.
